content:
Shouldn't the DevDays '18 content be released to the public by now? It's still password protected...
https://www.devdays.com/events/devdays-europe-2018/

Hi @Simone Heckmann ,
Yes, you are right! We normally release the DevDays content around 6 months later. We just published the DevDays '18 Amsterdam video's on our YouTube channel. The content page on devdays.com will follow shortly, which will have the presentations as well.
